amendment.description: To increase the authorized number of Defense Intelligence Senior Executive Service employees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1390 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1390 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S8651-8653; text: CR S8651) To increase the authorized number of Defense Intelligence Senior Executive Service employees.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1390 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1390 proposed by Senator Warner.
